name: Campaign Manager
overview: An election strategy game that came out in time for the 1984 Election in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1984/08 (Issue #14), then in the Best of COMPUTE! & Gazette, and later in COMPUTE!'s Commodore 64 & 128 Collection. This two-player national election simulation ranks as one of the best games we've published. With the right strategy, your candidate can make it to the White House.
